ModMetaData.name: [CZK] Sex Matters
ModMetaData.author: CitizenKanye, Hazzer, AlexisPopcorn
ModMetaData.description:
Introducing sexual dimorphism to RimWorld. Adds features that give significance to the gender of your pawns.
See workshop page for full list of features: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2613665098
Credits: - Coding by: Hazzer, AlexisPopcorn - Artwork by: CitizenKanye - Inspired by: Real life
